SCTX:
Begin MuseumHelmBearclaw

if ("Torasa Aram".helmbearclaw < 2)
	Disable
endif

if ("Torasa Aram".helmbearclaw == 2)
	Enable
endif

if (OnActivate == 1)
	set "Torasa Aram".helmbearclaw to 3
	Activate
	player->removeitem "helm_bearclaw_unique_x" 1
	player->additem "helm_bearclaw_unique" 1
endif


End MuseumHelmBearclaw
